001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Assignment;
004import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Grade;
005import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.GradeBook;
006import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Student;
007import org.hamcrest.Description;
008import org.hamcrest.Matcher;
009import org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher;
010import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
011
012import java.io.File;
013import java.time.LocalDateTime;
014import java.util.List;
015import java.util.Optional;
016import java.util.jar.Attributes;
017import java.util.jar.Manifest;
018
019import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.Submit.ManifestAttributes.*;
020import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
021import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.*;
022import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertThrows;
023
024public class ProjectSubmissionsProcessorTest {
025
026  /**
027   * Given: A submission from a student whose name is in the grade book,
028   * but whose id is not
029   *
030   * When: The submission is recorded
031   *
032   * Then: The submission is noted under the expected id and a new Student
033   * is <b>not</b> created.
034   *
035   * This tests issue #52 (https://github.com/DavidWhitlock/PortlandStateJava/issues/52)
036   */
037  @Test
038  public void matchStudentBasedOnFirstAndLastName() throws StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException {
039    String projectName = "Project";
040
041    GradeBook gradebook = createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName);
042    Student student = createStudentInGradeBook(gradebook);
043
044    String studentName = student.getFirstName() + " " + student.getLastName();
045    String wrongStudentId = "Not the student id we expect";
046    String wrongEmail = "Not the email that we expect";
047
048    Manifest manifest = manifest(projectName)
049      .setStudentName(studentName)
050      .setStudentId(wrongStudentId)
051      .setStudentEmail(wrongEmail)
052      .build();
053
054    noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(gradebook, manifest);
055
056    assertThat(gradebook.getStudent(wrongStudentId), isNotPresent());
057
058    assertThatProjectSubmissionWasRecordedForStudent(projectName, student);
059  }
060
061  @Test
062  public void matchStudentBasedOnNickAndLastName() throws StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException {
063    String projectName = "Project";
064
065    GradeBook gradebook = createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName);
066    Student student = createStudentInGradeBook(gradebook);
067
068    String studentName = student.getNickName() + " " + student.getLastName();
069    String wrongStudentId = "Not the student id we expect";
070    String wrongEmail = "Not the email that we expect";
071
072    Manifest manifest = manifest(projectName)
073      .setStudentName(studentName)
074      .setStudentId(wrongStudentId)
075      .setStudentEmail(wrongEmail)
076      .build();
077
078    noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(gradebook, manifest);
079
080    assertThat(gradebook.getStudent(wrongStudentId), isNotPresent());
081
082    assertThatProjectSubmissionWasRecordedForStudent(projectName, student);
083  }
084
085  @Test
086  public void matchStudentBasedOnEmail() throws StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException {
087    String projectName = "Project";
088
089    GradeBook gradebook = createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName);
090    Student student = createStudentInGradeBook(gradebook);
091
092    String studentName = "Not the student name we expect";
093    String wrongStudentId = "Not the student id we expect";
094    String email = student.getEmail();
095
096    Manifest manifest = manifest(projectName)
097      .setStudentName(studentName)
098      .setStudentId(wrongStudentId)
099      .setStudentEmail(email)
100      .build();
101
102    noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(gradebook, manifest);
103
104    assertThat(gradebook.getStudent(wrongStudentId), isNotPresent());
105
106    assertThatProjectSubmissionWasRecordedForStudent(projectName, student);
107  }
108
109  @Test
110  public void submissionDoesNotMatchAnyStudentInGradeBook() {
111    String projectName = "Project";
112
113    GradeBook gradebook = createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName);
114
115    String studentName = "Not the student name we expect";
116    String wrongStudentId = "Not the student id we expect";
117    String wrongEmail = "Not the email we expect";
118
119    Manifest manifest = manifest(projectName)
120      .setStudentName(studentName)
121      .setStudentId(wrongStudentId)
122      .setStudentEmail(wrongEmail)
123      .build();
124
125    assertThrows(StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException.class, () ->
126      noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(gradebook, manifest)
127    );
128  }
129
130  @Test
131  public void submissionTimeNotedInGradeBook() throws StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException {
132    String projectName = "Project";
133
134    GradeBook gradebook = createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName);
135    Student student = createStudentInGradeBook(gradebook);
136
137    LocalDateTime submissionDate = LocalDateTime.now().minusHours(2).withNano(0);
138    Manifest manifest = manifest(projectName)
139      .setStudent(student)
140      .setSubmissionDate(submissionDate)
141      .build();
142
143    noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(gradebook, manifest);
144
145    assertThat(student.getGrade(projectName).getSubmissionTimes(), contains(submissionDate));
146  }
147
148  @Test
149  public void estimatedHoursNotedInGradeBook() throws StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException {
150    String projectName = "Project";
151
152    GradeBook gradebook = createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName);
153    Student student = createStudentInGradeBook(gradebook);
154
155    Double estimatedHours = 4.5;
156    Manifest manifest = manifest(projectName)
157      .setStudent(student)
158      .setEstimatedHours(estimatedHours)
159      .build();
160
161    noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(gradebook, manifest);
162
163    List<Grade.SubmissionInfo> submissions = student.getGrade(projectName).getSubmissionInfos();
164    assertThat(submissions, hasSize(1));
165    assertThat(submissions.get(0).getEstimatedHours(), equalTo(estimatedHours));
166  }
167
168  @Test
169  public void submissionsPastDueDateAreLate() throws StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException {
170    String projectName = "Project";
171    LocalDateTime dueDate = LocalDateTime.now();
172
173    GradeBook gradebook = createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName, dueDate);
174    Student student = createStudentInGradeBook(gradebook);
175
176    LocalDateTime submissionDate = dueDate.plusDays(3);
177    Manifest manifest = manifest(projectName)
178      .setStudent(student)
179      .setSubmissionDate(submissionDate)
180      .build();
181
182    noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(gradebook, manifest);
183
184    assertThat(student.getLate(), contains(projectName));
185
186    Grade grade = student.getGrade(projectName);
187    assertThat(grade, notNullValue());
188    List<Grade.SubmissionInfo> submissions = grade.getSubmissionInfos();
189    assertThat(submissions, hasSize(1));
190    Grade.SubmissionInfo submission = submissions.get(0);
191    assertThat(submission.getSubmissionTime(), equalTo(submissionDate));
192    assertThat(submission.isLate(), equalTo(true));
193  }
194
195  @Test
196  public void submissionsBeforeDueDateAreNoteLate() throws StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException {
197    String projectName = "Project";
198    LocalDateTime dueDate = LocalDateTime.now();
199
200    GradeBook gradebook = createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName, dueDate);
201    Student student = createStudentInGradeBook(gradebook);
202
203    LocalDateTime submissionDate = dueDate.minusDays(3);
204    Manifest manifest = manifest(projectName)
205      .setStudent(student)
206      .setSubmissionDate(submissionDate)
207      .build();
208
209    noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(gradebook, manifest);
210
211    assertThat(student.getLate(), not(contains(projectName)));
212
213    Grade grade = student.getGrade(projectName);
214    assertThat(grade, notNullValue());
215    List<Grade.SubmissionInfo> submissions = grade.getSubmissionInfos();
216    assertThat(submissions, hasSize(1));
217    Grade.SubmissionInfo submission = submissions.get(0);
218    assertThat(submission.getSubmissionTime(), equalTo(submissionDate));
219    assertThat(submission.isLate(), equalTo(false));
220  }
221
222  private void noteProjectSubmissionInGradeBook(GradeBook gradebook, Manifest manifest) throws StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor.SubmissionException {
223    ProjectSubmissionsProcessor processor =
224      new ProjectSubmissionsProcessor(new File(System.getProperty("user.dir")), gradebook);
225    processor.noteSubmissionInGradeBook(manifest);
226  }
227
228  private void assertThatProjectSubmissionWasRecordedForStudent(String projectName, Student student) {
229    Grade grade = student.getGrade(projectName);
230    assertThat(grade, not(nullValue()));
231    assertThat(grade.isNotGraded(), equalTo(true));
232  }
233
234  private Student createStudentInGradeBook(GradeBook gradebook) {
235    Student student = new Student("studentId");
236    student.setFirstName("firstName");
237    student.setLastName("lastName");
238    student.setNickName("nickName");
239    student.setEmail("test@test.com");
240    gradebook.addStudent(student);
241    return student;
242  }
243
244  private GradeBook createGradeBookWithAssignment(String projectName) {
245    return createGradeBookWithAssignment(projectName, null);
246  }
247
248  private GradeBook createGradeBookWithAssignment(String projectName, LocalDateTime dueDate) {
249    GradeBook gradebook = new GradeBook("test");
250    Assignment assignment = new Assignment(projectName, 10.0);
251    assignment.setDueDate(dueDate);
252    gradebook.addAssignment(assignment);
253    return gradebook;
254  }
255
256  // Test match on email and nickname
257
258  private static Matcher<? super Optional<Student>> isNotPresent() {
259    return new TypeSafeMatcher<>() {
260      @Override
261      protected boolean matchesSafely(Optional<Student> item) {
262        return item.isEmpty();
263      }
264
265      @Override
266      public void describeTo(Description description) {
267        description.appendText("an Optional<Student> that is not present");
268      }
269    };
270  }
271
272  private ManifestBuilder manifest(String projectName) {
273    return new ManifestBuilder()
274      .setProjectName(projectName)
275      .setSubmissionDate(LocalDateTime.now())
276      .setSubmissionComment("Why is a comment required?")
277      ;
278  }
279
280  private static class ManifestBuilder {
281    Manifest manifest = new Manifest();
282
283    private ManifestBuilder setAttribute(Attributes.Name name, String value) {
284      this.manifest.getMainAttributes().put(name, value);
285      return this;
286    }
287
288    Manifest build() {
289      return manifest;
290    }
291
292    private ManifestBuilder setProjectName(String projectName) {
293      return setAttribute(PROJECT_NAME, projectName);
294    }
295
296    public ManifestBuilder setStudent(Student student) {
297      return setStudentId(student.getId())
298        .setStudentName(student.getFullName())
299        .setStudentEmail(student.getEmail())
300        ;
301    }
302
303    private ManifestBuilder setStudentId(String studentId) {
304      return setAttribute(USER_ID, studentId);
305    }
306
307    public ManifestBuilder setStudentName(String studentName) {
308      return setAttribute(USER_NAME, studentName);
309    }
310
311    public ManifestBuilder setStudentEmail(String studentEmail) {
312      return setAttribute(USER_EMAIL, studentEmail);
313    }
314
315    public ManifestBuilder setSubmissionDate(LocalDateTime submissionDate) {
316      return setSubmissionDate(Submit.ManifestAttributes.formatSubmissionTime(submissionDate));
317    }
318
319    private ManifestBuilder setSubmissionDate(String submissionDate) {
320      return setAttribute(SUBMISSION_TIME, submissionDate);
321    }
322
323    public ManifestBuilder setSubmissionComment(String submissionComment) {
324      return setAttribute(SUBMISSION_COMMENT, submissionComment);
325    }
326
327    public ManifestBuilder setEstimatedHours(Double estimatedHours) {
328      return setAttribute(ESTIMATED_HOURS, String.valueOf(estimatedHours));
329    }
330  }
331
332}
